258

- Growing solitarily in the bank of spring fed creek in mixed oak/hickory woodland.
- Cap flat, white with a yellow central umbo surrounded by a radial wrinkled zone.
- Lamellae, pale pink, adnexed, with frequent partial gills.
- Stipe long, fibrulose with an anulus and bulbous base with white rhizomorphs.

Additional Info
- Smell: fruity to anise-like.
